channel.title: Yeah that new trend that everyone's doing
channel.description:
Seems like EVERYBODY, and EVERYTHING has a myspace. I saw one for contacts earlier today.
well. now that this craze is going on.
I'd like to know y'alls if that's cool.
the only people I have from here are Bob's and Robbie's. let's change that =]
www.myspace.com/wtfroflcopter
oh yeah. if you add me. please send a message telling me who you are. I get so many friend requests, I usually deny all of them unless someone sticks out.

item.title: Yeah that new trend that everyone's doing
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

I fucking hate myspace it’s a waste of a teenage life. There is better shit to do then go on myspace like whacking off.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

On another topic

I have a myspace, I almost got addicted to using it lol. But I havent updated it for like 3 months I guess I’m bored of it. But I think myspace is more of a chick-thing.

roflmfao
I love it =]

like.
8/10 people on my friends list are girls.

it’s tons of fun for me =]

item.title: Yeah that new trend that everyone's doing
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

pookey71:

"Myspace"What is "Myspace"Never heard of it.All i know is that too many people are on there and they all want to know me.They want to love me.I’m scared somebody help me!

Myspace is like bebo. It is a site where you get to talk to your friends. They send you comments and you reply back. You can add photographs, videos and more.

Read full topic

item.source: Yeah that new trend that everyone's doing

item.title: Yeah that new trend that everyone's doing
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Myspace is really old.

And it’s a cult. Eventually you’ll add this mysterious friend, who actually is you. He’s just the you who you would’ve been if you hadn’t wasted so much time on myspace. More friends, better grades, and he has around two million dollars invested in a South American bank from his side job selling cocaine. He’s got some scarfaces hit going on. You wish you could’ve been him. Tom sends you a PM. It says: “Haha”.

Read full topic
